short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides Form-Fill SSO capabilities when used with Identity Automation’s RapidIdentity product

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides web automatic application integration for Identity Automation’s ExactAccess product.

Identity Automation’s SnapApp offers capabilities to easily add and manage web-based applications to ExactAccess, Identity Automation’s enterprise Single Sign-On (eSSO) and clinical workflow solution. With SnapApp, you can identify, create, and modify the sign-on functions to many common Web and Windows applications. Simply enable and integrate applications for ExactAccess through the intuitive drag and drop interface— no profiler, wizard, or scripting required. In addition, SnapApp provides the ability to configure web SSO links to launch in specific browsers, add custom input fields, assign access by Active Directory groups, and more.

SnapApp supports Microsoft Windows, Windows desktop applications, Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, and any chromium-based web browser.
